data.meta_description: Meeami has an AEC solution for use cases. From multi-channel AEC for hi-fi audio devices, stereo AEC for cars and laptops to mono AEC for simple smart speakers. Our AEC is tuned to work in enabling you to wake up an ASR just as easily as removing echo in a live conference call. Itâ€™s optimized for low-power operation on embedded and edge devices.
